mapper.sql: id, num1, num2, num3, result, status
mapper.select:
select
from yl_daxiao where status='0' order by id limit 0,1

select
from yl_daxiao where id=(select max(id) from yl_daxiao where status='1')

select
from yl_daxiao where status='1' order by id desc limit 0,20
mapper.insert:
insert into yl_daxiao
id,
num1,
num2,
num3,
result,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{num1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{num2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{num3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update yl_daxiao
num1 = #{num1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num2 = #{num2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num3 = #{num3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yl_daxiao set num1 = #{num1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num2 = #{num2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num3 = #{num3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
